content: i m very new to actually publishing patterns as opposed to just writing them for myself so any feedback is appreciated gauge is not precise and apologies for having no yardage approximately 14 5 in from horn to toe 37 cm scalable using different hooks and yarns requires working in the round and sewing with optional embroidery this little guy is one of my favorites to make and all of my friends have one at this point - in fact the one made for the pattern is number six he is a bit customizable and can have a variety of motifs at the end of his tail but the one given in the pattern is a diamond/square
